definition: Wong Tai Sin district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The Wong Tai Sin Temple is much older than the surrounding high-rise buildings.
sentences.chinese: 黃大仙祠比較周圍的高樓大廈年代久遠得多。

sentences.english: Temple outside a large Church, on the "Pinus densiflora Wong Tai Sin Temple of the biest".
sentences.chinese: 祠外的一個大牌坊，上着“赤松黃大仙祠”的大字。

sentences.english: The Wong Tai Sin Temple is one of Hong Kong's most renowned temples.
sentences.chinese: 黃大仙祠是香港最著名的廟宇之一。

sentences.english: Wong Tai Sin Temple is one of the most worshipped temples in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 黃大仙祠是香港最多人蔘拜及占卜的廟宇之一。

sentences.english: Not only Che Kung, but also Wong Tai Sin said the semblable answer.
sentences.chinese: 不論是車公，抑或黃大仙，他們的答案也是類似的。

definition: Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
Tsuen Wan district of New Territories, Hong Kong
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
Cheung Sha Wan (poultry market in Hong Kong)
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
running in opposite direction (buses, trains, ferries etc)
Saigon, capital of former South Vietnam/Sai Kung town in New Territories, Hong Kong
Hong Kong Island/abbr. for 香港島|香港岛[Xiang1 gang3 dao3]
